name: Forced Sacrifice: Hejled
description:
• This is an hardcore arcade-style game with a focus on fast and skill-based gameplay and immersive audiovisuals.
  • It relies on a simple, intuitive control scheme that allows players to quickly grasp the mechanics.



The game has a series of increasingly challenging levels that require the player to use their reflexes and timing to overcome obstacles. Gameplay of the game is highly addictive, as players strive to improve their skills and beat their high scores. The game features an immersive soundtrack and exellent graphic design
